蘽字的基本解释

蘽
lěi
古同“藟”，藤。

蘽字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lěi］
［《廣韻》力軌切，上旨，來。］
蔓生植物，有山蘽、虎蘽、蓬蘽、陵蘽等。

蘽字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　蘽； 康熙笔画：25； 页码：页1071第31
【唐韻】力軌切【集韻】魯水切，?音壘。【說文】木名。【爾雅·釋木】山蘽，似葛。虎蘽，有毛刺。【韻會】引《爾雅》註云：江東謂蘡薁爲千歲蘽，卽今言萬歲藤，大者如盌，故字从木，其形蔓似草，故从艸，在草木之閒也。　【正字通】同藟。○按《說文》《唐韻》諸書，藟訓草，蘽訓木，二字義別。《正字通》說非。

蘽字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
蘽字的起名意思

暂无。

Jian
Basic explanation of words
Jian
lěi
Ancient with "藟", vine.
Jian
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [lěi]
["Guangyun" force the track, the purpose, come. ]
Trailing plants, such as mountain cockroach, tiger cockroach, Peng cockroach, ling cockroach and so on.
Jian
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zong Zi] 　蘽; Kangxi Strokes: 25; Page Number: Page 1071 Page 31
[Tang Yun] force track cut [Ji Yun] Lu water cut, sound barrier. [Said the text] Wooden name. 【Erya·Shimu】Shanzhen, resembling Ge. The tiger has burrs. [Rhyme] Quoting "Erya" note: Jiangdong said that 蘡薁 is Chisui 蘽, 卽 Today is the long live vine, the big one is like a bowl, so the characters are from wood, and its shape is like grass. and also.　【Zhengzitong】Same as 藟. ○According to the books of "Shuowen" and "Tang Yun", the two characters are different. "Zhengzitong" said no.
Jian
